Protective Vines.name: Protective Vines
Protective Vines.flavor: Mielikki causes a growth of plants to constrict your foes and protect your friends.
Protective Vines.attack:
Your highest ability score modifier + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Your highest ability score modifier + 9 vs. Reflex
Protective Vines.onHit:
2d6 + your highest ability score modifier damage. The target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 3d6 + your highest ability score modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Call of the Forest.name: Call of the Forest
Call of the Forest.flavor: You draw on your connection to primal nature to cause constricting verdant growth to ensnare your enemies.
Call of the Forest.attack: Your highest ability score modifier + 9 vs. Will
Call of the Forest.onHit: 3d8 + highest ability modifier damage and the target is restrained (save ends).
Call of the Forest.effect: The burst creates a zone of verdant growth. The verdant growth is difficult terrain and heavily obscured. Each enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes 10 damage or falls prone (enemyâ€™s choice). Each beast ally and plant ally within the zone gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

Treestride.name: Treestride
Treestride.flavor: Your faith in Mielikki opens pathways that only creatures as close to nature as dryads can see.
Treestride.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action to teleport up to 20 squares if you begin and end the teleport adjacent to a plant or plant creature of Large size or larger.
